message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $9000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8500. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can offer the product to you for $8800. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I really appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8200. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $8100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I really appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8000. Can you meet me at this price?
